alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 08 at 12:30PM AKDT until October 10 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch through tonight with winds gusting as high as 30 mph. Snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches Monday through Monday night. * WHERE...Fortymile Country, Upper Tanana Valley, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until midnight AKDT Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow will reduce visibility and may cause slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lull between rounds of snowfall is forecast for tonight, although gusty winds will continue to produce areas of blowing snow. Snow returns through the day Monday from the southeast.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Fortymile Country; Upper Tanana Valley
